pages.text: 76|26|tatha raatri mein sajda karen usake samaksh aur usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen, raatri ke lambe samay tak.
76|27|vaastav mein, ye log moh rakhate hain sansaar se aur chhod rahe hain apane peechhe ek bhaaree din[1] ko.
76|28|hamane hee unhen paida kiya hai aur sudrdh kiye hain unake jod-band tatha jab ham chaahen badala den unake[1] jaise (doosaron ko).
76|29|nishchay ye (soorah) ek shiksha hai. atah, jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or (jaane kee) raah bana le.
76|30|aur tum allaah kee ichchha ke bina kuchh bhee nahin chaah sakate.[1] vaastav mein, allaah sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaala hai.
76|31|vah pravesh deta hai jise chaahe apanee daya mein aur atyaachaariyon ke lie usane taiyaar kee hai duhkhadaayee yaatana.
77|1|shapath hai bhejee huee nirantar dheemee vaayuon kee
77|2|phir jhakkad vaalee havaon kee
77|3|aur baadalon ko phailaane vaaliyon kee
77|4|phir antar karane[1] vaalon kee
77|5|phir pahunchaane vaalon kee vahî€¼yee (prakaashana[1]) ko
77|6|kshama ke lie athava chetaavanee[1] ke lie
77|7|nishchay jisaka vachan tumhen diya ja raha hai, vah avashy aanee hai.
77|8|phir jab taare dhumil ho jaayenge.
77|9|tatha jab aakaash khol diya jaayega.
77|10|tatha jab parvat choor-choor karake uda diye jaayenge.
77|11|aur jab rasoolon ka ek samay nirdhaarit kiya jaayega.
77|12|kis din ke lie ise nilambit rakha gaya hai
77|13|nirnay ke din ke lie.
77|14|aap kya jaanen ki kya hai vah nirnay ka din
77|15|vinaash hai us din jhuthalaane vaalon ke lie.
77|16|kya hamane vinaash nahin kar diya (avagya ke kaaran) agalee jaatiyon ka
77|17|phir peechhe laga[1] denge unake pichhalon ko.
77|18|isee prakaar, ham karate hain aparaadhiyon ke saath.
